snippet.title: Explore Hanoi Like A Local: Food, Fun And Fast Times
snippet.description: Hanoi, a city that once sounded so ominous, does have reminders of a dark history but also spectacular architecture and a mesmerizing culinary scene.

snippet.title: Korean Pro Gaming Champion Kim 'viOLet' Dong Hwan Talks StarCraft II
snippet.description: Kim "viOLet" Dong Hwan is a Korean Zerg currently playing for Team Empire. ViOLet is the reigning champion of the Major League Gaming Spring Arena 2 in New York City.
